        DrawZone constructor, creates a rectangular zone which the user may draw into.
        Parameters:
        x - int - X-coordinate of the upper left corner of the zone
        y - int - Y-coordinate of the upper left corner of the zone
        width - int - Width of the zone
        height - int - Height of the zone
        colourPicker -
        brushPicker -

        public void drawZone()
        Description copied from class: Zone
        Gets overrided by the zones that extend this class. The student may also override this method in his/her Processing sketch.
        Overrides:
        drawZone in class RectZone

      • addTouch

        public boolean addTouch(Touch tcur)
        Description copied from class: Zone
        The method which the user of this framework will override. By default, the touch does propagate to all the zones under the touch. When overriding this function in the zone's instantiation, return true if you do not want the touch to continue to propagate.
        Overrides:
        addTouch in class Zone
        Parameters:
        tcur - Touch - the "finger"
        Returns:
        true if the touch was handled

      • updateTouch

        public boolean updateTouch(Touch tcur)
        Description copied from class: Zone
        The method which the user of this framework will override. By default, the touch does propagate to all the zones under the touch. When overriding this function in the zone's instantiation, return true if you do not want the touch to continue to propagate.
        Overrides:
        updateTouch in class Zone
        Parameters:
        tcur - Touch - the "finger"
        Returns:
        true if the touch was handled
